title: Glow Watch Face
summary: Glow - a fully customizable and attractive watch face
description: Glow watch face is a Simple and Elegant watch face which shines on your wrist. It provides you with the must have configuration to fiddle up with and get the most out of your watch face. In short it is SIMPLICITY AT ITS BEST.Key features : ✔	5 color themes to choose from✔	Optimized for round and square watches✔	Date and day✔	Wear battery indicator✔	Phone Battery indicator✔	Analog and digital ambient mode options✔	Round face on square watch(only for square watches)Specific Android Wear options :✔	A watch preview, how the watch face will look on the watch✔	Share the watch face link with friends✔	Change seconds to sweep or tick✔	Analog or digital ambient mode✔	Round face on square watch(only for square watches)For any issues / feedback contact us on our  : Social groupsGoogle+ : https://goo.gl/fMSrKCFacebook : https://goo.gl/rt8mwnDeveloped by : Zatta and Shivam ChopraNotes:1.) Don't download it if you don't have android watch, it works with android watch only.2.) Sometime there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, we recommend a bit of patience if its not instantaneous for you . This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app.Wait a minute to let your Android Wear device sync. If you still face any issues them our social groups are open for you.
descriptionHTML:
Glow watch face is a Simple and Elegant watch face which shines on your wrist. It provides you with the must have configuration to fiddle up with and get the most out of your watch face. In short it is SIMPLICITY AT ITS BEST.

Key features :
✔ 5 color themes to choose from
✔ Optimized for round and square watches
✔ Date and day
✔ Wear battery indicator
✔ Phone Battery indicator
✔ Analog and digital ambient mode options
✔ Round face on square watch(only for square watches)

Specific Android Wear options :
✔ A watch preview, how the watch face will look on the watch
✔ Share the watch face link with friends
✔ Change seconds to sweep or tick
✔ Analog or digital ambient mode
✔ Round face on square watch(only for square watches)

For any issues / feedback contact us on our :

Social groups
Google+ : https://goo.gl/fMSrKC
Facebook : https://goo.gl/rt8mwn

Developed by : Zatta and Shivam Chopra

Notes:
1.) Don't download it if you don't have android watch, it works with android watch only.
2.) Sometime there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, we recommend a bit of patience if its not instantaneous for you . This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app.
Wait a minute to let your Android Wear device sync. If you still face any issues them our social groups are open for you.
comments: Simple and elegant Most simple, unique and elegant watch on play store. Simplicity at its best. Good color themes... 5 stars..
I love it. The minimalistic design and the glow in different colors are great. And I like the companion app a lot :)
